Yeah, sunday here in China.

> 
> Yeah, sunday here in China.

The release is on Tuesday for us, mate.

Personally I'm hoping it will be an auto release at midnight (squads time)... but I think it's unlikely as they will want to be on social media etc at release time.

I'll be generous and assume that they release as soon as they get in at 9am (or thereabouts). Mexico is 6 ours behind the UK, so if I am lucky, KSP will be waiting for me when I get home from work!

More likely I think, is that it will hit in the early hours of tuesday morning like most of the releases.

Heh - day kinda loses it's meaning when the audience spans the entire globe.

Fortunately I'm in EST, or GMT-0500, so my timezone is similar to Squad's.

(actually unfortunately EDT, or GMT-0400. Daylight savings can suck it though with it's stupid obsolescence.)
